name: Boxy Trivia
description:
A quiz game meant to educate and entertain all ages.

It was built with the LÖVE framework version 11.2. https://love2d.org/ You have access to the text, images, sound and animation(sprites) to mod it. Add and delete content to your heart's delight.

Controls
  • Menu - Up, Down, Enter buttons
  • Next Question - Down button
  • Game Over (to continue) - Down button
